attributes.action: Increase spending on road building so that we have a decent network that everyone can use regardless of income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is considering introducing road pricing. This is only necessary because not enough has been invested in maintaing and building the current road network. The proposals are mean-spirited and unfairly penalise the poorest in society. Britain needs a good road network to maintain its economic prosperity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
